scripts.configure: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright install msedge
scripts.test:fullfunctional: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium
scripts.test:crossbrowser: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project webkit --project firefox
scripts.test:ChromeDSS: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @DSSCreate
scripts.test:FirefoxDSS: yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project firefox --grep @DSSCreate
scripts.test:WebkitDSS: yarn playwright install webkit && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project webkit --grep @DSSCreate
scripts.test:CrossDeviceDSS: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project MobileSafari --project MobileChrome --grep @DSSCreate
scripts.test:AccessibilityDSS: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @DSSAccessibility
scripts.test:ChromeCaseAPI: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @CaseAPI
scripts.test:FirefoxCaseAPI: yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project firefox --grep @CaseAPI
scripts.test:WebkitCaseAPI: yarn playwright install webkit && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project webkit --grep @CaseAPI
scripts.test:CrossDeviceCaseAPI: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project MobileSafari --project MobileChrome --grep @CaseAPI
scripts.test:AccessibilityCaseAPI: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @accessibilityCaseAPI
scripts.test:ChromeUC: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @DSSUpdate
scripts.test:FirefoxUC: yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project firefox --grep @DSSUpdate
scripts.test:WebkitUC: yarn playwright install webkit && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project webkit --grep @DSSUpdate
scripts.test:CrossDeviceUC: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && echo 'Install successful' && npx playwright test --project MobileSafari --project MobileChrome --grep @DSSUpdate
scripts.test:AccessibilityUC: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --project chromium --grep @UpdateAccessibility
